generic.contactSupport: [RU] If this persists, please contact support.

permission.noPermission: [RU] You don't have permission to do this.
permission.botNoPermission: [RU] I don't have permission to do this.
permission.ownerOnly: [RU] This action can only be performed by the server owner.

validation.tooLong: [RU] Must be no more than {{max}} characters.
validation.invalidEmail: [RU] Must be a valid email address.
validation.invalidChoice: [RU] Invalid choice. Please select from the available options.

rateLimit.tooManyRequests: [RU] Too many requests. Please slow down.

auth.notLoggedIn: [RU] You must be logged in to do this.
auth.sessionExpired: [RU] Your session has expired. Please log in again.
auth.unauthorized: [RU] You are not authorized to access this resource.

server.featureDisabled: [RU] This feature is disabled on this server.

premium.required: [RU] This feature requires a premium subscription.
premium.tierRequired: [RU] This feature requires {{tier}} tier or higher.
premium.limitReached: [RU] You have reached the limit for your subscription tier.

bot.botCannotTarget: [RU] I cannot perform this action on myself.
bot.cannotTargetOwner: [RU] I cannot perform this action on the server owner.
bot.cannotTargetHigherRole: [RU] I cannot perform this action on users with a higher role than me.
bot.cannotTargetSelf: [RU] You cannot perform this action on yourself.
